newsitem.title: INDIA: CRICKET-CULLINAN HITS CHANCELESS CENTURY FOR SOUTH AFRICA.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-CULLINAN HITS CHANCELESS CENTURY FOR SOUTH AFRICA.

text.p: balls by Daryll Cullinan carried South Africa to 249 for six in
their Titan Cup one-day match against India on Wednesday.
Cullinan put on 113 in 143 balls for the third wicket with
skipper Hansie Cronje after opener Andrew Hudson had been
trapped leg before by medium-pacer Venkatesh Prasad for five and
Gary Kirsten had top-edged leg-spinner Anil Kumble to Sunil
Cronje hit 58 off 73 balls before being caught and bowled by
By scoring 29, Kirsten became the highest scorer in one-day
internationals in a calendar year. His tally of 1,352 beat the
previous best of 1,349 set in 1993 by Brian Lara.
